entry.summary:
Vendor: Atosa Refrigeration
Type: Stock Pot Burners
Price: 941.00

Atosa ATSP-18-2L 20"H Double Natural Gas Stock Pot Stove

  • NEW full width, removable stainless steel drip pan for easy cleanup
  • Compact, heavy duty chassis for a long life span
  • Stainless steel sides and front valve cover
  • Stainless steel tubing for pilots
  • Heavy, cast iron three- ring burner, rated at a total of 80,000 BTU/hr

entry.title: Atosa ACHP-6 Countertop 36" 6 Burner Gas Hot Plate
entry.summary:
Vendor: Atosa Refrigeration
Type: Hot Plates
Price: 983.00

Dimension: 36" Wide X 27-1/2" Deep x 13" Height(Including 4" legs)
# of Burners: 6 Burners independent manual control
BTU: 192,000 Total 
Warranty: 1 Year Parts and Labor Warranty

 

Atosa ACHP-6 36" Countertop 6 burner hot plate will be a perfect addition to any kitchen to cook up some delicious cuisine. The heavy duty stainless steel constructions prolong usage and easy maintenance. The 4" adjustable legs comes standard with every unit. The removable burner and burner grate provide easy cleaning. Best of all, this unit offers the best valve and comes with 1 year worry free parts and labor warranty. 
  • The Next Generation of ruggedly constructed gas griddles, charbroilers, fryers, and plates deliver heavy duty performance.
  • Durable stainless steel structure for corrosion-resistant and easy maintenance.
  • Heavy duty burners with stable flame and stand by pilot 
  • Adjustable 4" Legs
  • Quality products at an exceptional value, that help operators of commercial kitchens and restaurants realize better bottom line results.
  • The unit is the most economical and flexible in the food service industry.
  • Intertek ETL Listed and NSF compliant to North American product safety standards and required sanitation standards.
